title: Consider the process
text: When a building is demolished, is there more or less disorder in the system of debris compared to the intact building?

title: Relate destruction to entropy
text: Think about what happens to the structure of the building during demolition. How does this affect the level of disorganization or randomness in the system?

title: Analyze the components
text: As the building is demolished, does the number of possible arrangements of objects increase or decrease? How does this relate to entropy?

title: Determine entropy change
text: Entropy measures the degree of disorder. When the building is demolished, does the system's disorder increase, decrease, or remain the same?
